title: Pattern For Embroidery
medium:
Partly worked printed pattern for embroidery. If finished result would have been a circular table center.
Technique: Buttonhole, stem, overcasting and knot stitches following a printed pattern on a plain weave foundation.
inscribed: at bottom. "Use Richardson Mt Mellick silk" "1791" "18 in."
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Partly worked printed pattern for embroidery. If finished result would have been a circular table center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pattern For Embroidery.
Partly worked printed pattern for embroidery. If finished result would have been a circular table center.
Technique: Buttonhole, stem, overcasting and knot stitches following a printed pattern on a plain weave foundation.. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz. 1983-14-1.
